name: csv-data-management
label: CSV Data Management
description: CSV Data management will allow to read  and import CSV rows as records, along with options to deduplicate , merge two CSV files and then import and more utility functions

operations.title: Extract Data from CSV
operations.description: This action will extract data from CSV based on column names provided. User can select option to deduplicate rows based on columns

parameters.name: input
parameters.title: Type
parameters.description: Type of option you want to use to provide CSV file. Type can be an Attachment ID or a File IRI.

parameters.name: value
parameters.title: Reference ID
parameters.description:
Reference ID that is used to access the attachment metadata from the FortiSOARâ„¢ Attachments module.
In the playbook, this defaults to the{{vars.attachment_id}} value or the {{vars.file_iri}} value.
